titleInfo.title: Capital Heights children's parade photograph, circa 1940-1955.

mods.abstract: Capital Heights is a historic neighborhood in Baton Rouge, La., that held a children's Mardi Gras parade.

titleInfo.title: Mardi Gras Mambo: Selections from LSU Libraries Special Collections
